chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: The question is, write an HTML and CSS code to style a paragraph inside a div which contains 5 other paragraphs.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: So here is a div and inside the div you have 5 more paragraphs.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: And here you can see that the first paragraph must have a background color yellow and text color red.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: So this is the condition for the first paragraph.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: And the background color of all other paragraphs is blue and text color white.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: So to solve this problem, I will first put the background color of all my paragraphs in blue.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: By the way, I hit the control enter if you don't know.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: For example, your cursor is here and you want to bring it in a new line.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: I will keep telling you these things.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: Hit the control enter and it will come down.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: If your cursor is here, hit the control enter and it will come down.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: And here you can see that its background color is blue and text color is white.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: So the background color of all paragraphs will be blue and text color white.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: There are no surprises here.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts

chunks.text: So the first paragraph will be like this.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: So this was a very simple one.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: People have also used the nth child pseudo selector.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: In the nth child, if the first child is p,

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: then such a property will be applied on the paragraph.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: In the nth child, suppose you make it 2.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: So if p is the second child, then it will be applied.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: Let's say I do it and show you.

chunks.text: Because we have come here to learn CSS.

chunks.text: If I have made nth child 2 and I put it here,

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: then you see the property will be applied on the second child.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: See, this means that you should apply this property on p

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: when it is the second child of your parent.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts
chunks.text: Okay, this is what it means.
